description: Creating a React web app with Redux for user authentication. Basic features include: home, login, logout, and profile management. API routes are set up, and the integration is focused on Green Code principles with image optimization.

Development of a React app based on Figma mockups, including Collapse animations and responsiveness. Constraints include managing photo scrolling in the gallery, hiding buttons if there's only one image, maintaining a constant gallery height, and initializing Collapses in a closed state.

Set up the development environment, create the portfolio presentation page, code the login page, add a modal to handle the addition, deletion, and submission of projects, and dynamically process the API response to update the gallery.
